error.signature: Error: Failed to install provider: the lock file is out of date
error.regex: (lock file .+ out of date|dependency lock file|terraform.lock.hcl .+ (mismatch|missing)|Failed to install provider .+ lock)

verdict.summary: The .terraform.lock.hcl file does not match the required provider versions or platforms.

dead_ends.why_fails: The lock file ensures reproducible builds; without it, different team members get different provider versions

dead_ends.action: Manually edit the lock file hash values
dead_ends.why_fails: Manual hash edits are error-prone and may introduce security risks by accepting untrusted providers

workarounds.action: Run terraform init -upgrade to update the lock file with new provider versions
workarounds.how: terraform init -upgrade updates provider versions and regenerates the lock file

workarounds.action: Add platform hashes for cross-platform teams using terraform providers lock

leads_to.condition: Lock file mismatch prevents provider installation
